channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (Telnet Commands)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (Telnet Commands)

item.title: CVE-2021-21485|2024-08-03T18:16:22.530Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20for%20java%20%28telnet%20commands%29
item.description: An unauthorized attacker may be able to entice an administrator to invoke telnet commands of an SAP NetWeaver Application Server for Java that allow the attacker to gain NTLM hashes of a privileged user.
